name: Sandra Shroff
quote: No one cared for the poor in Marathwada, only Save Hasdeo cared.

name: Pradeep Kheruka
quote: Mayank Gandhi has been constantly working only on Development, Development and Development.

name: Sumeet Raghavan
quote: Incredible Work, All one is to do is plant, plant and plant trees.

name: Archana Puran Singh
designation: Indian Television Presenter and Film Actress
quote: Mayank Gandhi's work through Save Hasdeo is commendable. Environment, climate & lives of farmers are in safe hands because of you.

name: Sushil Jiwarajka
quote: This model can change not only the economy of India, but also of many poor countries.
